accounts_savings_fields_only_for_saving.name: accounts_savings_fields_only_for_saving
accounts_savings_fields_only_for_saving.value: ("accounts"."type" = 'saving') OR ("accounts"."savings_target_amount" IS NULL AND "accounts"."savings_target_date" IS NULL)

accounts_debt_fields_only_for_debt.name: accounts_debt_fields_only_for_debt
accounts_debt_fields_only_for_debt.value: ("accounts"."type" = 'debt') OR ("accounts"."debt_initial_amount" IS NULL AND "accounts"."debt_due_date" IS NULL)

accounts_payment_no_type_specific_fields.name: accounts_payment_no_type_specific_fields
accounts_payment_no_type_specific_fields.value: ("accounts"."type" != 'payment') OR ("accounts"."savings_target_amount" IS NULL AND "accounts"."savings_target_date" IS NULL AND "accounts"."debt_initial_amount" IS NULL AND "accounts"."debt_due_date" IS NULL)

events_valid_date_range.name: events_valid_date_range
events_valid_date_range.value: "events"."start_date" IS NULL OR "events"."end_date" IS NULL OR "events"."end_date" >= "events"."start_date"
